textBeforeTable: 1m2f polytrack oval for 6f, 7f, 1m, 1m3f, 1m4f and 2m races. Inner 6f track for 5f and 1m2f races. Has floodlights for evening winter racing. Right handed Sharp Polytrack Kempton   A Polytrack Galloping Left Wolverhampton A Fibresand Sharp Left Southwell A Polytrack Sharp Left Lingfield R Polytrack Sharp Right Kempton TV Surface Speed Direction Course UK All Weather Courses The key to finding winners is to look for horses that do well at particular courses and trainers and jockeys who have good records at the track. Turf form does not transfer to the all weather tracks so when looking for winners consider only all weather form. In addition, form does not transfer well between the different tracks because of the different surfaces and the different characteristics of each course. Saying that, the consistent nature of the surfaces means that most races can be run at a good pace and you get more truly run races.
textAfterTable: 2m Average 6 to aw courses Lingfield Left handed Sharp Polytrack 1m2f triangular polytrack surface inside the turf course. It has an extended chute to give a 1m5f start. There is a gradual bend into the back straight.
